notes: Populate script_hashes/style_hashes with sha256-<base64> values if you add inline scripts/styles.
Rotate CSP_NONCE per response at the edge (Cloudflare Worker/Pages) and inject it into the CSP header and any inline tags if used.
Do not add 'unsafe-eval' to script-src; remove libraries that rely on eval/new Function to preserve CSP integrity.
